contentList.content: When resurrected, you resurrect to full health. You begin combat with maximum AP.
Pet Pal enables you to talk to animals. Also increases your maximum number of summons by 1, but reduces their damage and Vitality by 50%.
Arrow Recovery provides a 33% chance to recover a special arrow after shooting it. Also removes the close-quarter damage penalty of ranged weapons.
Increases all damage by 3% per point. Physical damage is further increased by 3% per point, and damaging statuses by 5% per point. Allows you to lift and carry heavier items.
Increases all damage by 3% per point. Damage dealt by skills is further increased by 3% per point, and Accuracy is increased by 2% per point.

Walk It Off reduces all status durations by 1 turn, including positive statuses. Does not affect statuses with a duration of 1 turn. Also increases all resistances by 10% each time you are hit by a character, up to a maximum of 50%, until the next turn.
Increases all damage by 3% per point. Gain 1% Dodge per point and increase movement by 0.15m per AP per point.
Leech heals you when standing in blood. Also increases Lifesteal by 25%.
Stench decreases everyone's attitude towards you by [2], but melee opponents find you less attractive in combat. Also increases your Poison resistance by 30% and makes you immune to Diseased.
[1] lets you evade attacks of opportunity. Also increase your Dodge by 5% and Movement by 1m per AP.
Mnenomic doubles all points invested in Memory.

A character with [1] has an extra 30% [3], but takes a [4]% penalty to [5]. Additionally, the maximum [3] is raised by [6]. Demon grants 20% additional damage on all Burning and Necrofire statuses you apply to enemies. Ice King increases all Water damage you deal by 20%.
[1] allows you to flee combat even when enemies are close by. Also makes you immune to Crippled, Entangled and Enwebbbed.
While above 75% Vitality, Hothead provides 10% Critical Chance and 10% Chance to Hit. Chance to Hit is a flat bonus unaffected by Accuracy and Dodge.
Ambidextrous reduces the cost of using grandes and scrolls by 1 AP when your off-hand is free. Also provides 2 free equipment switches per turn.
Shadow
[1] adds an extra [2]m range to your grenade throws and increase their damage by 30%.
Duelist increases AP Start and Recovery by 1 and Maximum by 2 if you are wielding a Single-Handed weapon with a free off-hand.
Duelist
Dual-Wielding increases damage and Dodging when wielding two Single-Handed weapons. Also increases off-hand damage by 10% per point.
Dual-Wielding
[1] increases damage and Critical Chance when using bows and crossbows. Also increases the range by 0.5m per point when wielding a bow, crossbow or wand(s).

Single-Handed increases damage and Accuracy when using a single-handed weapon (dagger, sword, axe, mace or wand) with a shield or empty off-hand. Also increases armors by 6% and resistances by 2% per point.

Two-Handed increases damage and Critical Multiplier when using two-handed melee weapons (swords, axe, mace, spear or staff). Also grants 2% Chance to Hit per point. Chance to Hit is a flat bonus unaffected by Accuracy and Dodge.
The first skill used during your turn has its cooldown reduced by 1 turn.
Savage Sortilege allows all magical skills to Critically Strike. Also increases your Critical Chance by 10% (applied multiplicatively after all other bonuses).

Perseverance restores Magic Armour on recovering from Frozen or Stunned, and restores Physical Armour on recovering from Knocked Down or Petrified. Additionally, 2% of maximum Vitality is restored per point.

Your chance to Critically Strike when attacking with a weapon or when using a skill that is weapon-based. If you Backstab, your Critical Chance is converted to additional damage in a ratio of 1% Critical Chance to 2% damage.
The damage you inflict when successfully hitting an enemy or object. This number does not account for attribute bonuses.
[1] grants Dodging and Resistance bonuses to all allies in a 16m radius.
